1.1.name: wordpress/evoca-audio-recorder
1.1.description:
This plugin enables you to invite visitors to your WordPress blog or website to record comments, opinions, suggestions, language practice sessions, interviews, stories, poems, auditions, and any other voice or audio content using a computer mic. The visitors can include an email address and comments.

Users typically place (embed) a recorder in the sidebar of a blog or website using the copy/paste code we auto-generate for your Evoca account. It does not require visitors to have an account to use the recorder. The plugin is available with any Evoca subscription, free trial or paid.

For more information about Evoca free and paid subscription sign-up, visit http://www.evoca.com and our How It Works section. Three types of Evoca subscription plans are available. Subscribers can start with the 30-day
